response.overview: Noori, a transgender woman, estranged from her family, has escaped natal violence and found a home with her chosen queer friends. On her quaint 18th birthday, the queer household pulses with dreams and laughter, until there is an unkind stranger at the door - the police and her father, seeking to use the loopholes of the law to repossess her, while prosecuting her friends under an arbitrary kidnapping case.  Six friends, three scenes, a police case and one gun.
response.tagline: Who is allowed to be angry and how much?
response.title: Don't Interrupt While We Dance
